text: James Corden denied being the'drunkest'person at the 2018 Met Gala. In an interview last month on The Howard Stern Show, Andy Cohen - who attended the annual fashion event in early May - claimed Corden was the'drunken guest '. But the 39 - year - old TV host visited Stern's studio on Tuesday and explained it wasn't intoxication but'just my natural exuberance of life '. Denial! James Corden denied being the'drunkest'person at the 2018 Met Gala He explained he rarely drinks because of his schedule adding :'I think people often think I'm drunk just because I'm just having such a nice time.'Corden attended the New York fete with his wife Julia Carey as they enjoyed a rare night out together.'The reason I
